content: I don't have current information regarding the exact amount of prize money allocated to the different racecourses, but it is generally known that some of the biggest and most prestigious races in horse racing offer some of the highest prize money payouts. for instance, some of the most popular races like the dubai world cup, the pegasus world cup, the kentucky derby, the prix de l'arc de triomphe, and the breeders' cup races tend to offer large amounts of prize money to the winners. these prize money allocations can range from hundreds of thousands to millions of dollars or pounds, and are considered to be among the most lucrative prizes in the world of horse racing. ultimately, the prize money allocated to each race depends on several factors, such as the popularity and prestige of the race, the amount of sponsorship it receives, and the overall financial resources of the various stakeholders involved.
